remarks: Foulis-Holland Theorem, part 3.  Dual of ~ omlfh1N .  (Contributed by NM, 8-Nov-2011.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
omlfh1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
omlfh1.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
omlfh1.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
omlfh1.c $e |- C = ( cm ` K ) $.
omlfh3N $p |- ( ( K e. OML /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) /\ ( X C Y /\ X C Z ) ) -> ( X .\/ ( Y ./\ Z ) ) = ( ( X .\/ Y ) ./\ ( X .\/ Z ) ) ) $.
